text:
@chuckwoolery That's b/c you're paying attention. The inventor of the most widely used test to detect COVID-19 claimed the test is inaccurate & can be used to achieve a desired result depending on how it's conducted. I believe this is how they're falsifying case #'s.

https://t.co/QT81IfjnZO
